New Records: Jason Holder became the first West Indian to take a hat-trick in T20Is and recorded five wickets for 27 runs in 2.5 overs
Key Match Events: Jason Holder's hat-trick and five-wicket haul in the last over, England's poor decision-making and key dismissals leading to their downfall
Post-Match Reflections: Jason Holder praised his team's effort and his own performance, while Moeen Ali reflected on England's series loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: West Indies clinched the series 3-2, ending England's dominance
High-scoring match with crucial contributions from both sides
